tasks.title: Optimize test infrastructure for modular architectures
tasks.description: Improve the test infrastructure to better support the newly refactored modular architectures (scenarios, log-streaming, enterprise-secrets). Create focused test helpers, mock factories, and utilities that leverage the modular structure for more efficient and maintainable testing. Include test optimization for individual modules and integration testing improvements.

tasks.title: Create comprehensive test suite for Make.com FastMCP server
tasks.description: Implement comprehensive test coverage for the FastMCP server. Current coverage is only 1.36% with zero coverage for all tool files. Need to create unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests for all major components including tools, middleware, API client, and server functionality.
